servinfo.title: Engine Accessory Drive Belt, Tensioner and Idler Replacement

attention1.ptxt: Replacement must be performed with battery negative cable disconnected to avoid a personal injury.

servinfo.ptxt: Replace belt (1), tensioner (2) and idlers (3) with new ones referring to Accessory Drive Belt and Idler Pulley Removal and Installation .
Check crankshaft pulley (4) for wear and damage, and replace it as necessary.
